Home » 38P2 Dhammānuloma (1), Dukapaṭṭhānapāḷi (2) » 10 Mahantaraduka » 10.4 Cittasampayuttaduka » 10.4.1 Paṭiccavāra » 10.4.1.1 Paccayānuloma » 10.4.1.1.1 Vibhaṅgavāra
Ārammaṇa
Mahantaraduka
Cittasampayuttaduka
Paṭiccavāra
Paccayānuloma
Vibhaṅgavāra
Ārammaṇa
147.
2679Cittasampayuttaṃ dhammaṃ paṭicca cittasampayutto dhammo uppajjati ārammaṇapaccayā—  cittasampayuttaṃ ekaṃ khandhaṃ paṭicca dve khandhā, dve khandhe…pe…  paṭisandhikkhaṇe…pe… . (1)
2680Cittavippayuttaṃ dhammaṃ paṭicca cittasampayutto dhammo uppajjati ārammaṇapaccayā—  paṭisandhikkhaṇe vatthuṃ paṭicca cittasampayuttakā khandhā. (1)
2681Cittasampayuttañca cittavippayuttañca dhammaṃ paṭicca cittasampayutto dhammo uppajjati ārammaṇapaccayā—  paṭisandhikkhaṇe cittasampayuttaṃ ekaṃ khandhañca vatthuñca paṭicca dve khandhā, dve khandhe ca…pe…  (Saṃkhittaṃ.) (1)
